options.name: 1) Say 'hello' and then give me a smile!
2) Give me a smile and say 'hello' in sync!
3) Can you channel your inner Baymax and say something while mimicking his gentle expressions and voice?
4) Let’s do some Spider-Man cosplay. Perform a signature Spider Man gesture with your body, while saying a classic quote from Spider Man at the same time.
5) Picture this: Spider-Man just landed right in front of you. How would a true fan react? Don’t just tell me—show me! Use your face and body to express that sheer excitement!
6) Here's how to react when someone compliments you: Laugh with exaggerated expressions, use bold body language, and enthusiastically shout: "Thank you! I really appreciate your feedback."
7) Imagine you're diving into the open sea! Act out your swimming style, and don’t forget the facial reactions.
8) You are awesome! 'Thank you! I really appreciate your feedback.'
